definition: China Export Commodities Fair also known as the Canton Fair
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Now I'd like to brief you on the 106th Canton Fair.
sentences.chinese: 下面我向大家介紹本屆廣交會的主要情況。

sentences.english: The first Canton Fair was held in 1957 by the Chinese government.
sentences.chinese: 廣交會是中國政府在1957年創辦的。

sentences.english: Under such circumstances, the Canton Fair booth price even higher than the number of international exhibitions.
sentences.chinese: 這樣來說，廣交會的展位價格甚或高於一些國際展會。

sentences.english: The Dong Fang Hotel during the trade fair housed a motley collection of people from every corner of the globe.
sentences.chinese: 廣交會期間東方賓館的客人來自全球各地，膚色各異。

sentences.english: The 106th Canton Fair Phase II is in progress.
sentences.chinese: 第106屆廣交會二期正在進行中。

sentences.english: The first Guanzhou Autumn Fair was held in 1957.
sentences.chinese: 1957年舉辦了第一屆秋季廣交會。

sentences.english: Years ago, when our children were small, my wife made a business trip to the Spring GuangzhouTrade Fair.
sentences.chinese: 好多年前，我的孩子還小，我太太去春季廣交會出差。

sentences.english: Breakfast and shuttle-bus to the Fair are free during the Guangzhou Trade Fair.
sentences.chinese: 廣交會期間專車接送廣交會，並贈送免費早餐。

sentences.english: Breakfast and shuttle-bus to the Fair are free during the Guangzhou Trade Fair.
sentences.chinese: 廣交會期間專車接送廣交會，並贈送免費早餐。

sentences.english: Business trip, specifically to attend the canton (guangzhou) fair.
sentences.chinese: 出差，確切地說是來參加廣交會的。

sentences.english: Hundreds of thousands of people attend the Guangzhou Trade Faireach year.
sentences.chinese: 每年有成千上萬的人來參加廣交會。

sentences.english: Price-performance ratio is much higher than the foreign exhibition Fair.
sentences.chinese: 國外展會的性價比遠遠高於廣交會。

sentences.english: In 1957 Chee Kwon assisted China in setting up the first Guangzhou Trade Fair.
sentences.chinese: 1957年，陳志昆參與協助第一屆廣交會的成立。

sentences.english: Businessmen were granted access once a year for the Canton Trade Fair.
sentences.chinese: 商人們只在每年一次的廣交會上被允許入境。

sentences.english: Hundreds of thousands of people attend Guangzhou Fair each year.
sentences.chinese: 每年有成千上萬的人來參加廣交會。

sentences.english: In the Canton Fair, the previous winning BrandName China.
sentences.chinese: 在廣交會上，歷次獲得中國名優產品殊榮。

definition: to exhibit at or take part in a trade show etc
the curtain falls/lower the curtain/to come to an end (of a meeting)
conferences and exhibitions, abbr. of 會議展覽|会议展览[hui4 yi4 zhan3 lan3]
the duration of a conference/the period over which a conference (or expo etc) is held/session/the date of a meeting
